data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Accordion,
        Heading,
        Text,
        Transition,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Accordion.Container
    logic_name="accordion-transitions"
>
    <Accordion.Group
        logic_id="accordion-transitions-1"
    >
        <Accordion.Label palette="accent">
            Section One
        </Accordion.Label>

        <Accordion.Section>
            <Transition
                animation="fade"
                variation="enter"
            >
                <Heading>Item One Content</Heading>

                <Text>
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,
                    consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin
                    et consectetur orci. Curabitur a
                    egestas turpis, vitae convallis
                    sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum
                    tellus, in iaculis dolor tincidunt
                    non. Orci varius natoque penatibus
                    et magnis dis parturient montes,
                    nascetur ridiculus mus.
                </Text>
            </Transition>
        </Accordion.Section>
    </Accordion.Group>

    <Accordion.Group
        logic_id="accordion-transitions-2"
    >
        <Accordion.Label palette="accent">
            Section Two
        </Accordion.Label>

        <Accordion.Section>
            <Transition
                animation="fade"
                variation="enter"
            >
                <Heading>Item Two Content</Heading>

                <Text>
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,
                    consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin
                    et consectetur orci. Curabitur a
                    egestas turpis, vitae convallis
                    sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum
                    tellus, in iaculis dolor tincidunt
                    non. Orci varius natoque penatibus
                    et magnis dis parturient montes,
                    nascetur ridiculus mus.
                </Text>
            </Transition>
        </Accordion.Section>
    </Accordion.Group>

    <Accordion.Group
        logic_id="accordion-transitions-3"
    >
        <Accordion.Label palette="accent">
            Section Three
        </Accordion.Label>

        <Accordion.Section>
            <Transition
                animation="fade"
                variation="enter"
            >
                <Heading>Item Three Content</Heading>

                <Text>
                    Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet,
                    consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin
                    et consectetur orci. Curabitur a
                    egestas turpis, vitae convallis
                    sapien. Sed pellentesque rutrum
                    tellus, in iaculis dolor tincidunt
                    non. Orci varius natoque penatibus
                    et magnis dis parturient montes,
                    nascetur ridiculus mus.
                </Text>
            </Transition>
        </Accordion.Section>
    </Accordion.Group>
</Accordion.Container>
data.title: Accordion Transitions
